The '''[[2007 NFL season|2007]] [[St. Louis Rams]] season''' was the 70th season for the team in the [[National Football League]] and their 13th in [[St. Louis, Missouri|St. Louis]], [[Missouri]]. This was the worst season ever for the Rams during their time in St. Louis, and their worst overall since [[1991 Los Angeles Rams season|1991]], when the Rams were in [[Los Angeles, California|Los Angeles]], [[California]].
The '''[[2007 NFL season|2007]] [[St. Louis Rams]] season''' was the 70th season for the team in the [[National Football League]] and their 13th in [[St. Louis, Missouri|St. Louis]], [[Missouri]]. This was the worst season ever for the Rams during their time in St. Louis, and their worst overall since [[1991 Los Angeles Rams season|1991]], when the Rams were in [[Los Angeles, California|Los Angeles]], [[California]].
